name: Monthly Review
description: Reflect and review your month.A collection of digital and printable reflection journals to help you reflect month by month in Notion.How does it work?Review your months and summarize them with the "Quarterly Review" printable template. It includes 6 reflective questions, 3 things you should stop/start/continue doing, and an assessment of the month.Combine the printable planners with the printable reflection journal to routinely plan, track, review, and reflect on your entire year.What's included
features: Combine the printable planners with the printable reflection journal to routinely plan, track, review, and reflect on your entire year.; Monthy wins; Monthly challenges; Monthly rating; Individuals; Professionals; Anyone who would like to review and reflect on their performance; Absolutely. Just duplicate the template from the link after your purchase.
